Translated Text: Uhalifu wa awali ulisababishwa na nini?

User Input: Kiume, sensing Njeru's loneliness, offered his friendship. At first, Njeru hesitated, remembering the tricks he had played on others. But as time went by, he found himself growing fonder of Kiume.
Translated Text: Kiume, ambaye alitambua upweke wa Njeru, alitoa rafiki yake, kwanza, Njeru alisitasita, huku akikumbuka mbinu aliyokuwa amecheza juu ya wengine.
Correct Translation: Kiume ambaye alitambua upweke wa Njeru, alijitolea kuwa rafiki yake, kwanza, Njeru alisitasita, huku akikumbuka mbinu aliyokuwa amecheza juu ya wengine.
